list.name: Changes
list.comment: Code reviewed (date variable changed to localDateTime across all classes. Tested to ensure user can view their calendar meetings either on a specific day or all meetings. User now able to add meeting and receive message that it was added successfully. Does not yet check if a meeting already exists and if it is a valid meeting slot.

task.summary: Project set up and timeslot package created with; enum class T^imeSlot for the status of the slot - either 'available' or 'busy'. abstract class for a Timeslot and concrete classes for Meeting and Available.
Renamed classes to Busy and Available. Added utilities packages with commandLine class and Manager package with AddMeeting and TimeSlotFinder classes

Added additional utility classes inputHandler and calendarUtils . Converted Calender class to abstract and created concrete class userCalender along with calenders for 3 users, Emma, Sam and Pablo. Added or adjusted code to classes AddMeeting, AdjustWorkingDayTimes and FreeTimeSlotFinder classes in the manager package. Added calenderUtils to calculate available time slots

Code reviewed (date variable changed to localDateTime across all classes. Tested to ensure user can view their calendar meetings either on a specific day or all meetings. User now able to add meeting and receive message that it was added successfully. Does not yet check if a meeting already exists and if it is a valid meeting slot.

Added additional utility classes inputHandler and calendarUtils . Converted Calender class to abstract and created concrete class userCalender along with calenders for 3 users, Emma, Sam and Pablo. Added or adjusted code to classes AddMeeting, AdjustWorkingDayTimes and FreeTimeSlotFinder classes in the manager package. Added calenderUtils to calculate available time slots

Code reviewed (date variable changed to localDateTime across all classes. Tested to ensure user can view their calendar meetings either on a specific day or all meetings. User now able to add meeting and receive message that it was added successfully. Does not yet check if a meeting already exists and if it is a valid meeting slot.
